column1: #Text=Lin says : " Take these Equalists and lock them in the temple 's basement !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Oh , thank goodness you 're all right !
#Text=" Meelo says : " We caught the bad guys .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You let them fight ?
#Text=Do you realize what could have happened ?
#Text=" Lin says : " I would have been toast if it were n't for your kids .
